title: The Galaxy in the sea
creator_credit: Film Australia, Don Murray, Dietmar Fill, George Hart and Klaus Jaritz
brief_description: A microscopic look at the Barrier Reef. Shows many of the 350 species of coral plus a variety of fish, sea slugs, and the fascinating Spanish Dancer.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Australia, Don Murray, Dietmar Fill, George Hart and Klaus Jaritz
